newsitem.title: USA: Gencorp says IRS settlement positive for Q2.
newsitem.headline: Gencorp says IRS settlement positive for Q2.

text.p: GenCorp said Monday that receipt of a $65 million settlement from the Internal Revenue Service will have a significant positive impact on its second quarter profit, as well as strengthening its balance sheet.
The company said that the funds provide it with increased financial flexibility to make acquisitions and to implement plans for focused growth in selected businesses.
The company said on May 8, 1997 that it had acquired the Printworld division of privately-held Technographics, Inc for an undisclosed sum.
